meta.title: Collegiate Charter School of Lowell

h1.strong: Welcome to the Collegiate Charter School of Lowell!

article.p: To find our latest updates about Collegiate and COVID 19, please visit our COVID 19 Updates page.

hr.p: Collegiate Charter School of Lowell (Collegiate), formally known as Lowell Collegiate Charter School (LCCS), opened in the fall of 2013 in Lowell, Massachusetts. The school is located on a brand new campus, which is surrounded by a great neighborhood with engaged parents. Collegiate Charter School of Lowell is currently enrolled with approximately 931 students in grades K-9. In Fall 2020, Collegiate will expand to accommodate grades K-10 with approximately 1019 students. This college-preparatory charter school will continue to expand by one grade level each year until it offers a full K-12 program. Collegiate provides Special Education services and English Language Learner services for all qualifying students.
For more information about enrolling at Collegiate, please visit the Enrollment page or contact the School Registrar.
Head on over to the News and Information section of our website to see our latest newsletters, messages and more.
Parents and Guardians are encouraged to sign up for the SABIS®Digital Platform by completing the online application form located here.

div.a: "SABIS school curriculum is very expansive and helps the students to be aware of global affairs."
"I feel safe sending my son to this school."
"My child and I love this school. I have to say it's the best school in Lowell. My two other kids attend regular public schools and their schools would..."
"We are very happy at the school so far. All of the teachers and staff are very friendly and all of the kids seem happy in the morning when they arrive..."

div.a: Collegiate Charter School of Lowell YOU Matter

div.p: SABIS® is a global education network that has an active presence in 20 countries on five continents.
SAGA is the alumni association serving thousands of SABIS® alumni around the world.
The SABIS® Careers website features job openings from across the global SABIS® Network.

span.p: Equal Employment Opportunity has been, and will continue to be, a fundamental principle at Collegiate Charter School of Lowell, where employment is based upon personal capabilities and qualifications without discrimination because of gender identity, race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy and sexual harassment), sexual orientation, age, national origin, disability, sex discrimination in payment of wages to women and men performing substantially equal work in jobs that require equal skill, effort and responsibility under similar working conditions, or any other protected characteristic as established by law.

div.p: Governor Baker ordered all Massachusetts schools to remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 school year.
Collegiate will continue with online learning as planned. More details to follow.
Please visit our COVID 19 Updates page for more.

For further information please contact us on:
lowell.sabis.net
